attributes.action: introduce Tax relief on Hybrid Vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We appeal to The Government that the additional revenue collected from the recent rise in Vehicle & Fuel (Petrol & Diesel) be used to subsidise & promote Hybrid Vehicles. This could be achieved by means of a new Powershift Grant being introduced in order to reduce the purchase price of such Vehicles
